definition: remote/hidden away/secluded/serene/peaceful/to imprison/in superstition indicates the underworld/ancient district spanning Liaonang and Hebei provinces
to close (a door)/to eclipse/muddled/stupid/ignorant/variant of 暗[an4]

sentences.english: Some days must be dark and dreary.
sentences.chinese: 有些日子肯定幽暗而郁悒。

sentences.english: Knell beetles have also been known to be used as mounts by Underdark races.
sentences.chinese: 已经知道丧钟甲虫会被幽暗地域的种族用作坐骑。

sentences.english: The spaciousness and gloom of this vast edifice produce a profound and mysterious awe.
sentences.chinese: 这座大寺空旷幽暗，使人产生深沉而神秘的敬畏之念。

sentences.english: And the day is dark and dreary.

sentences.chinese: 煤气灯投下一片片幽暗的光。

sentences.english: Once again, everything is immersed in gloom.
sentences.chinese: 一切又一次陷入幽暗之中。

sentences.english: He could see the cave now, even darker in the morning light.
sentences.chinese: 他现在能看见岩洞了，在晨曦中显得更加幽暗。

sentences.english: Two doors along, a rubric stood out from the tenebrous gloom.
sentences.chinese: 走过两扇门，黑洞洞的幽暗中显现出注目的题目。

sentences.english: The night air was as cold as water in the dim and quiet village with brilliant stars in the sky overhead.
sentences.chinese: 夜凉如水，走在幽暗寂静的寨中，头顶星空璨灿夺目。

sentences.english: I kept the supernatural cast that I’m sure inhabited those dark woods.
sentences.chinese: 我保留了那些肯定是住在幽暗森林中的超自然人物。

sentences.english: My soul goes out in a longing to touch the skirt of the dim distance.
sentences.chinese: 我的灵魂在极想中走出，要往摸触幽暗的远处的边沿。

sentences.english: Through verdurous glooms and winding mossy ways.
sentences.chinese: 葱绿的幽暗，和苔藓的曲径。

sentences.english: And with thee fade away into the forest dim:   20
sentences.chinese: 随你一道在幽暗的林中消逝。

sentences.english: The room was quiet in the dimness of early evening .
sentences.chinese: 幽暗的黄昏中，房间一片宁静。

sentences.english: And the people stood afar off, and Moses drew near unto the thick darkness where God [was].
sentences.chinese: 于是百姓远远地站立，摩西就挨近神所在的幽暗之中。

sentences.english: Bow down, archangels, in your dim abode.
sentences.chinese: 躬身致意吧，大天使，在你幽暗的居所。

definition: serene and hidden in depth or distance
light/beam of light/gleam of light/light reflected from an object

pinyin: shen1 shou3 bu4 jian4 wu3 zhi3
